plugin.name: camel
plugin.author: Chris Navta
plugin.title: Simple integration with Apache Camel
plugin.description:
\ A simple integration with Apache Camel, giving Controolers and Services a 'sendMessage' method that will send a message to a given endpoint.
To configure routing, a 'Routes.grooy' is created in grails-app/conf that contains a class that extends GrailsRouteBuilder.
